pageContext.claim: “The media was able to get my work schedule, something very easy to do, but it should have been reported as a positive, not negative. When the term Executive Time is used, I am generally working, not relaxing. In fact, I probably work more hours than almost any past President.....”
pageContext.analysis: Experts say it was unprecedented for a White House staffer to leak three months' worth of Trump's daily schedules to {Axios}. It has been widely reported that Trump has long blocks of unstructured time every day (dubbed "executive time") and that he spends it tweeting or watching TV or working or getting on the phone to talk with friends and advisers or all of the above.
